PerfectNetExp.abs: 意音文字（logogram），或称语素-音节文字、语词-音节文字，是一种图形符号既代表语素，又代表音节的文字系统。这种文字系统是 …
汉字是语素文字（logogram），随着人类文明发展已经完全淘汰。语素文字是民智未开才使用，比如象形文，而今是智能时代，改用 …
实际上,“Hsie Wang”是“望天树协作组”的简写(logogram),按中国的命名习惯,即不姓“望”,也不名“协”。在中国上世纪60-70年代,中国的部分科学论著曾以单位.
例如在eulogize (称赞) 、pro2 logue (序言) 、monologue (独语) 、dialogue (对话) 、epi2 logue (结束词) 、apologize (道歉) 、logogram(语标) 、neolo2.

list.abs: logogram 词符, logograms 语标书写法, logograms 智力图解诗歌
ACP is the logogram of English of area of Africa , Caribbean , Pacific Area ., ACP 是非洲 , 加勒比地区 , 太平洋地区英文的简写.

CLD is the central living area logogram , the Village and the surrounding geographical area , is the central technology zone logogram CID , the location is in the Zhongguancun and the surrounding areas .CLD是中央生活区的简写，地域是在亚运村及其周围地区，CID是中央科技区的简写，地点是在中关村及其周围地
a character conveying the lexical meaning of a logogram ., 表达语标词汇意义的字符.

means.word_mean: 1. a single written symbol that represents an entire word or phrase without indicating its pronunciation;

sentences.sentence: "7 is a logogram that is pronounced `seven' in English and `nanatsu' in Japanese"
